news.title: Revenue is chasing tens of thousands of pensioners over owed tax
news.summary: The Revenue Commissioners have written to thousands of pensioners to warn of incorrect tax payments.

news.title: ‘I had to track her ashes using a code, like she was a parcel in the post’ – daughter speaks about mother’s assisted death at Swiss clinic
news.summary: The daughter of the Co Cavan-based woman who was assisted in ending her life alone at a controversial Swiss clinic has told of her sadness and disbelief after her ashes were sent home in the post.

news.title: Donald Trump pushes for end to war in Gaza as Benjamin Netanyahu plots to occupy entire Gaza Strip
news.summary: US president Donald Trump is pushing for an “all or nothing” agreement to end the war in Gaza, while Israel’s prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu wants to occupy the entire Gaza Strip, according to reports.

news.title: Aidan Fitzmaurice: Under-fire Ole Gunnar Solskjaer knows if Besiktas flop against St Pat’s it will cost him dearly
news.summary: It wasn’t quite a coronation, but there was a lot of adulation on Irish soil.

news.title: The Indo Daily: Dee Devlin: The woman who always stands by Conor McGregor and her role in his multi-million euro empire
news.summary: Conor McGregor predicts she is going to be Ireland’s first lady – but who is Dee Devlin?

news.title: ‘I passed out in the car with my kids in the back’ – why even young children need to know what to do in an emergency
news.summary: Last June, I passed out behind the wheel of the car with my then four- and seven-year-old sons in the back seat. I’d suffered a ruptured ovarian cyst, and the pain was so acute it caused me to faint, with just seconds to try and ensure my children were safe.

news.title: Operation renovation: ‘This is our forever home, so we didn’t want to cut corners’
news.summary: There was a long-as-your-arm list of things wrong with Ally and Wes Carter’s timber frame bungalow in Kilkenny, from rotting joists and ageing wiring to the outdated layout and rising damp.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: More deaths in Gaza will not deliver peace for Benjamin Netanyahu
news.summary: Seemingly impervious to the consequences, and unmoved by international outrage, Benjamin Netanyahu is now intent on total conquest of Gaza.

news.title: Eoin McGee answers: ‘I’m 26 with €50k in savings and €7k in crypto. Should I invest in shares or buy a house?’
TDs’ salaries rise to €117,113 a year after the latest €1,000 pay hike
news.summary: TDs have received a pay rise of more than €1,000 a year under the latest national public sector wage deal.
